title: London Theatergoers Are on the Edge of His Seats
description: One family firm supplies seating for most of the West End’s theaters, from flexible new spaces to Victorian treasures. Its chief designer reveals some tricks and traps of the trade.
dc:creator: Alex Marshall
category: Perelman, Ronald O, Performing Arts Center
media:credit: Tom Jamieson for The New York Times
media:description: Seats in the auditorium of the Theater Royal in London’s West End that were made by Kirwin & Simpson.
